title: Increase the Quota for Roaming AppData
body: It would be great if the Roaming Folder Quota was larger than 100KB, (1 MB at least), this would prevent us from having to depend on a network/paid service to have great cross-device customer experiences.

comments.body: Great idea, can you explain your payload a bit that causes you to go above 100kb?  Having use cases and scenarios is extremely helpful
